thought.author: Grace Hopper
thought.description: ğŸ‘©ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» Today's #ThoughtsOnProgramming features Grace Hopper, United States Navy rear admiral and computer scientist, who was among many other things, one of the first programmers of the Harvard Mark I computer.
thought.quote:
People have an enormous tendency to resist change. They love to say, "We've always done it this way."
I try to fight that.
